name: NEDNSOverHTTPSSettings
desc: The DNS resolver settings for a DNS-over-HTTPS server.

items.name: var serverURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL of a DNS-over-HTTPS server.

items.name: var matchDomains: [String]?
items.desc: A list of domain strings used to determine which DNS queries will use the DNS resolver settings contained in this object.
